name: Fungus Reaper
description:
Explore a moody forest and adventure deeper and deeper to collect mushlings that will help you on your journey.
At the end of the day, turn your mushlings into soup to become an even stronger reaper.

Next time you might even come out alive...

🍄 Features


  • Tons of different mushlings to collect for customizing each run to your playstyle
  • Tactical player movement, jump over mushlings to gain an upper hand over the animals, or when in doubt, teleport!
  • Turn-based action with a twist! The clock is always ticking ... take too long and the animals will move before you!
  • A new adventure every time, the forest will change so you need to do the same!
  • A colorful pixel-art style
